newsItems.title: New Study Links Insomnia to Heart Disease
newsItems.summary: Researchers have found a strong correlation between chronic insomnia and increased risk of heart disease.

newsItems.title: Natural Remedies for Better Sleep
newsItems.summary: Experts suggest various natural methods to improve sleep quality, including herbal teas and meditation.

newsItems.title: The Impact of Technology on Sleep Patterns
newsItems.summary: A recent study explores how the use of electronic devices before bedtime affects sleep quality.
